item.description:
Hi everyone,

I work for the Samaritans which provides crisis intervention and prevention services for those who are feeling suicidal. This walk is for a great cause. Unfortuantley, I have to work the event so I can't actually walk but hope to see you there. Please note you do not have to register or pay the $20 fee (unless you want to of course). You just have to show up.

More info:

Join the Samaritans for the tenth annual "Run for Someone Else's Life" Run/Walk along the Charles. There will be festivities to follow, which include live music, games, refreshments and a kid's race.

WHEN: Saturday, October 4, 2008


Race: 10:00 a.m.
WHERE: Artesani Park, 1234 Soldiers Field Rd Road in Brighton.

http://www.samaritans...

http://www.mapquest.c...
item.name: Samaritans benefit walk in Brighton
